title: Disappointed with Blood Moon Talon Lacking a Hood
body: Not only his recall. I'm really disappointed Talon doesn't have a hood and Twisted Fate somehow does. How something so distinctly Talon just slipped into the hands of Twisted Fate boggles me. I feel like Talon and TF swapped because Talon is missing a hood. The mask doesn't scream to me "this is Talon" and I'm not the not the only one who initially mistook TF for Talon in the teaser simply because one of them had a hood.

replies.body: I like it, not every skin he has requires a hood. It brings variety and makes him look distinctively different. That's a positive thing in my book. Also his mask/entire outfit is badass.
I do like the hood and feel it should go to talon, but I'm stil gonna play talon just for this skin.
dont touch the hat!  oh, hood, i meant 'dont touch the hood!'

He doesn't have a hood in his dragonblade skin.

http://lolwp.com/wp-content/uploads/chinesenewyeartalon2.jpg

Anyways, you should of been able to tell by their postures.

As TF stands straight up while Talon is slightly crouched over (or how to english, idk)
